Therapy.title: Therapy book kariye

steps.step1: Ap hamare dhaayn se chune hue, bahubhashi therapists se chun sakte hain.
steps.step2: Vo din aur samay chuniye jo apke liye sabse acha kaam karta hain. Saare sessions online hain.
steps.step3: Agar aap apka mann badal jata hain, toh kisi bhi samay aap apne sessions rok sakte hain ya therapist badal sakte hain.
steps.step4: Aap jo kuch bhi sajha karte hain vo apke aur therapist ke beech poori tarha gopniye rehta hai.

Therapy.modalDescription: Āpkī therapy session schedule karne ke liye SimplyBook.me widget.

error.initializingWidget: Booking widget initialize karne mein error.
error.initializingWidgetRetry: Retry par booking widget initialize karne mein error.
error.containerNotFoundRetry: Booking widget load nahīn ho sakā.
error.scriptNotLoaded: Booking widget script pūrī tarah se load nahīn huā.
error.scriptLoadFailed: Booking script load karne mein asafaltā.

therapyBookings.bookingSummary: Aapke paas <remainingTotal>{remainingTotal}</remainingTotal> therapy sessions baaki hain, <upcomingTotal>{upcomingTotal}</upcomingTotal> scheduled hain.
therapyBookings.noBookingSummary: Aapke paas koi therapy sessions baaki nahi hain.
therapyBookings.noBookings: Aapne apni sabhi uplabdh therapy sessions book kar li hain.
therapyBookings.cancelAlert: Booking ID ke liye cancellation request ki gayi hai: {id}. Vastavik cancellation logic implement karein.

bookingItem.videoLink: Email dwara bheje gaye Google Meet calendar aamantran se call mein shaamil hon.
bookingItem.cancelError: Booking radd karne mein truti - kripya punah prayaas karein ya team se sampark karein.
bookingItem.noVideoLink: Koi link nahi diya gaya hai

cancelDialog.title: Cancel karna confirm karein
cancelDialog.description: Kya aap vaakai apni {dateTime} ke lie nirdhaarit therapy satr radd karna chahte hain? Aap apni suvidhaanusaar ek naya appointment book kar sakte hain.

accessGuard.title: Therapy uplabdh nahi hai
accessGuard.introduction: Apke Bloom account mein therapy sessions ki access shamil nahi hai. Yadi yeh theek nahi lag raha toh <contactLink>Bloom ki team ko message kariye</contactLink>.
